   20: -module(io_proto_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([setopts_getopts/1,unicode_options/1,unicode_options_gen/1, 
   26:          binary_options/1, read_modes_gl/1, logging_gl/1,
   27: 	 read_modes_ogl/1, broken_unicode/1,eof_on_pipe/1,
   28:          unicode_prompt/1, shell_slogan/1, raw_stdout/1, raw_stdout_isatty/1,
   29:          file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1, file_read_stdin_list_mode/1,
   30:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   31:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   32:          file_read_line_stdin_cr_without_nl/1,
   33:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   34:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   35:          io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode/1,
   36:          io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_until_stdin_list_mode/1,
   37:          io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1,
   38:          file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode/1,
   39:          file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode/1,
   40:          io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode/1
   41:         ]).
   42: 
   43: 
   44: -export([io_server_proxy/1,start_io_server_proxy/0, proxy_getall/1, 
   45: 	 proxy_setnext/2, proxy_quit/1]).
   46: %% For spawn
   47: -export([answering_machine1/3, answering_machine2/3]).
   48: 
   49: -export([uprompt/1, slogan/0, session_slogan/0]).
   50: 
   51: -export([write_raw_to_stdout/0, read_raw_from_stdin/1]).
   52: 
   53: -export([get_until_eof/2]).
   54: 
   55: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   56: 
   57: %%-define(debug, true).
   58: 
   59: -ifdef(debug).
   60: -define(dbg(Data),io:format(standard_error, "DBG: ~p\r\n",[Data])).
   61: -else.
   62: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
   63: -endif.
   64: 
   65: suite() ->
   66:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   67:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   68: 
   69: all() -> 
   70:     [setopts_getopts, unicode_options, unicode_options_gen,
   71:      binary_options, read_modes_gl, read_modes_ogl, logging_gl,
   72:      broken_unicode, eof_on_pipe, unicode_prompt,
   73:      shell_slogan, raw_stdout, raw_stdout_isatty,
   74:      file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   75:      file_read_stdin_list_mode,
   76:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   77:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   78:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   79:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   80:      io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode,
   81:      io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode,
   82:      io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode,
   83:      io_get_until_stdin_list_mode,
   84:      io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   85:      file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode,
   86:      file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode,
   87:      io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode
   88:     ].
   89: 
   90: groups() -> 
   91:     [].
   92: 
   93: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   94:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
   95:     os:putenv("TERM","vt100"),
   96:     DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
   97:     [{default_shell,DefShell},{term, Term}|Config].
   98: 
   99: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  100:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  101:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  102:     ok.
  103: 
  104: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  108:     Config.
  109: 
  110: -record(state, {
  111:                 q = [],
  112:                 nxt = eof,
  113:                 mode = list
  114:                }).
  115: 
  116: uprompt(_L) ->
  117:     [1050,1072,1082,1074,1086,32,1077,32,85,110,105,99,111,100,101,32,63].
  118: 
  119: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  120: unicode_prompt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  122:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  123: 	new ->
  124: 	    rtnode:run(
  125:               [{putline,""},
  126:                {putline, "2."},
  127:                {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  128:                {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  129:                {expect, "[\n ]default"},
  130:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  131:                {putline, "hej"},
  132:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  133:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  134:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  135:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  136:                {putline, "hej"},
  137:                {expect,"[\n ]hej"},
  138:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  139:               ],[],"",["-pa",PA]);
  140:         _ ->
  141:             ok
  142:     end,
  143:     %% And one with oldshell
  144:     rtnode:run(
  145:       [{putline,""},
  146:        {putline, "2."},
  147:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  148:        {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  149:        {expect, "default"},
  150:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  151:        {putline, "hej"},
  152:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  153:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  154:        {expect, "[\n ]\\?*ok"},
  155:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  156:        {putline, "hej"},
  157:        {expect,"[\n ]\\?*hej"},
  158:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  159:       ],[],"",["-oldshell","-pa",PA]),
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  163: shell_slogan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  165:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  166: 	new ->
  167: 	    rtnode:run(
  168:               [{expect, "\\Q"++string:trim(erlang:system_info(system_version))++"\\E"},
  169:                {expect, "\\Q"++io_lib:format("Eshell V~s (press Ctrl+G to abort, type help(). for help)",[erlang:system_info(version)])++"\\E"}
  170:               ],[],"",[]),
  171:       	    rtnode:run(
  172:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  173:                {expect, "\nTest session slogan \\("}
  174:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","\"Test slogan\"",
  175:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","\"Test session slogan\""]),
  176:       	    rtnode:run(
  177:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  178:                {expect, "\\Q\nTest session slogan (\\E"}
  179:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:slogan/0",
  180:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:session_slogan/0",
  181:                        "-pa",PA]);
  182:         _ ->
  183:             ok
  184:     end.
  185: 
  186: slogan() ->
  187:     "Test slogan".
  188: session_slogan() ->
  189:     "Test session slogan".
  190: 
  191: %% Check io:setopts and io:getopts functions.
  192: setopts_getopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     FileName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  194: 			      "io_proto_SUITE_setopts_getopts.dat"]),
  195:     {ok,WFile} = file:open(FileName,[write]),
  196:     Server = start_io_server_proxy(),
  197:     [{binary, false}] = io:getopts(Server),
  198:     [getopts] = proxy_getall(Server),
  199:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(WFile)),
  200:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  201:     "Hej" = io:get_line(Server,''),
  202:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  203:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_line(Server,''),
  204:     ok = io:setopts(Server,[{binary,true}]),
  205:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  206:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  207:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  208:     <<72,101,106,200,148>> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  209:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts",[<<72,101,106,200,148>>])),
  210:     file:write(WFile,<<"HejA">>),
  211:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,unicode)),
  212:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,big})),
  213:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,little})),
  214:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,big})),
  215:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,little})),
  216:     file:close(WFile),
  217:     {ok,RFile} = file:open(FileName,[read]),
  218:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  219:     [$H,$e,$j,$A] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  220:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  221:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  222:     [{binary,false},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  223:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  224:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  225:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  226: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  227:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  228:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  229:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  230: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  231:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  232:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  233:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  234: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  235:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  236:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  237:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  238: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  239:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  240:     file:position(RFile,0),
  241:     io:setopts(RFile,[{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}]),
  242:     <<$H,$e,$j,$A>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  243:     [{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  244:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  245:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  246:     [{binary,true},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  247:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  248:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  249:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  250: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  251:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  252:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  253:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  254: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  255:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  256:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  257:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  258: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  259:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  260:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  261:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  262: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  263:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  264:     file:close(RFile),
  265:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  266: 	new ->
  267: 	    %% So, lets test another node with new interactive shell
  268: 	    rtnode:run(
  269:               [{putline,""},
  270:                {putline, "2."},
  271:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  272:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  273:                {expect, "{binary,false}"},
  274:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  275:                {putline, "hej"},
  276:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  277:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  278:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  279:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  280:                {putline, "hej"},
  281:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
  282:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(terminal,io:getopts())."},
  283:                {expect, "true"},
  284:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdin,io:getopts())."},
  285:                {expect, "true"},
  286:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdout,io:getopts())."},
  287:                {expect, "true"},
  288:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stderr,io:getopts())."},
  289:                {expect, "true"}
  290:               ],[]);
  291:         _ ->
  292:             ok
  293:     end,
  294:     %% And one with oldshell
  295:     rtnode:run(
  296:       [{putline,""},
  297:        {putline, "2."},
  298:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  299:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  300:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
  301:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  302:        {putline, "hej"},
  303:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  304:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  305:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  306:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  307:        {putline, "hej"},
  308:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
  309:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(terminal,io:getopts())."},
  310:        {expect, "true"},
  311:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdin,io:getopts())."},
  312:        {expect, "true"},
  313:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdout,io:getopts())."},
  314:        {expect, "true"},
  315:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stderr,io:getopts())."},
  316:        {expect, "true"}
  317:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
  318: 
  319:     %% Test that terminal options when used in non-terminal are returned as they should
  320:     %% both when run as an os:cmd and when run directly as a port.
  321:     Erl = ct:get_progname(),
  322:     CmdStr = os:cmd(Erl ++ " -noshell -eval \"io:format(~s'~p.',[io:getopts()])\" -s init stop"),
  323:     maybe
  324:         {ok, T, _} ?= erl_scan:string(CmdStr),
  325:         {ok, Opts} ?= erl_parse:parse_term(T),
  326:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(terminal,Opts)),
  327:         case os:type() of
  328:             {win32, nt} ->
  329:                 %% On Windows stdin will be a tty
  330:                 ?assertEqual(true, proplists:get_value(stdin,Opts));
  331:             _ ->
  332:                 ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdin,Opts))
  333:         end,
  334:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdout,Opts)),
  335:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stderr,Opts))
  336:     else
  337:         _ -> ct:fail({failed_to_parse, CmdStr})
  338:     end,
  339: 
  340:     Port = erlang:open_port({spawn, Erl ++ " -noshell -eval \"io:format(~s'~p.',[io:getopts()])\" -s init stop"},
  341:             [exit_status]),
  342:     PortStr = (fun F() ->
  343:         receive
  344:             {Port,{data,D}} -> D ++ F();
  345:             {Port,{exit_status,0}} -> []
  346:         end
  347:     end)(),
  348: 
  349:     maybe
  350:         {ok, PortT, _} ?= erl_scan:string(PortStr),
  351:         {ok, PortOpts} ?= erl_parse:parse_term(PortT),
  352:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(terminal,PortOpts)),
  353:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdin,PortOpts)),
  354:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdout,PortOpts)),
  355:         ?assertEqual(proplists:get_value(stderr, io:getopts()), proplists:get_value(stderr,PortOpts))
  356:     else
  357:         _ -> ct:fail({failed_to_parse, PortStr})
  358:     end,
  359:     ok.
  360: 
  361: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  362: file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  363:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  364: 
  365:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  366:     {ok, "got: <<\"abc\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  367:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  368:     {ok, "got: <<\"def\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  369:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  370:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  371: 
  372:     ok.
  373: 
  374: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  375: file_read_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  376:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  377: 
  378:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  379:     {ok, "got: \"abc\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  380:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  381:     {ok, "got: \"def\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  382:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  383:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  384: 
  385:     ok.
  386: 
  387: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  388: %% correct error when in binary mode
  389: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  390:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  391: 
  392:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  393:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  394:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  395:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  396: 
  397:     ok.
  398: 
  399: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  400: %% correct error when in list mode
  401: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  402:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  403: 
  404:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  405:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  406:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  407:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  408: 
  409:     ok.
  410: 
  411: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when \r is sent without \n
  412: file_read_line_stdin_cr_without_nl(_Config) ->
  413:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, []),
  414: 
  415:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc\r"),
  416:     {error,timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 2000),
  417:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def\r\n"),
  418:     {ok, ~S'got: <<"abc\rdef\r\n">>\n'} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  419:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  420:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  421: 
  422:     ok.
  423: 
  424: 
  425: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  426: %% correct error when in binary mode
  427: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  428:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [binary]),
  429: 
  430:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  431:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  432:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  433:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  434: 
  435:     ok.
  436: 
  437: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  438: %% correct error when in list mode
  439: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  440:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [list]),
  441: 
  442:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  443:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  444:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  445:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  446: 
  447:     ok.
  448: 
  449: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in binary mode
  450: io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  451:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  452:                          fun() ->
  453:                                  case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  454:                                      eof -> eof;
  455:                                      Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  456:                                  end
  457:                          end, [binary]),
  458: 
  459:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  460:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  461:     {ok, "got: <<\"\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  462:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  463:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  464: 
  465:     ok.
  466: 
  467: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in binary mode
  468: io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  469: 
  470:     GetUntilEof =
  471:         fun() ->
  472:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  473:                 IoServer !
  474:                     {io_request,
  475:                      self(),
  476:                      IoServer,
  477:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  478:                 receive
  479:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  480:                         {ok, Data}
  481:                 end
  482:         end,
  483: 
  484:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  485: 
  486:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  487:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  488:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  489:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  490: 
  491:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  492: 
  493:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  494:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  495:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  496: 
  497:     ok.
  498: 
  499: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in list mode
  500: io_get_until_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  501: 
  502:     GetUntilEof =
  503:         fun() ->
  504:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  505:                 IoServer !
  506:                     {io_request,
  507:                      self(),
  508:                      IoServer,
  509:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  510:                 receive
  511:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  512:                         {ok, Data}
  513:                 end
  514:         end,
  515: 
  516:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  517: 
  518:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  519:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  520:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  521:     {ok, "got: \"x\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  522: 
  523:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  524: 
  525:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  526:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  527:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  528: 
  529:     ok.
  530: 
  531: get_until_eof([],eof) -> {done,eof,[]};
  532: get_until_eof(ThisFar,eof) -> {done,ThisFar,eof};
  533: get_until_eof(ThisFar,CharList) -> {more,ThisFar++CharList}.
  534: 
  535: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in list mode
  536: io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  537:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  538:                          fun() -> case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  539:                                       eof -> eof;
  540:                                       Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  541:                                   end
  542:                          end, [list]),
  543: 
  544:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  545:     {ok, "got: \"x\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  546:     {ok, "got: \"\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  547:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  548:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  549: 
  550:     ok.
  551: 
  552: %% Test that mixing io:get_chars and file:read works when stdin is in binary mode.
  553: io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  554:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  555:                          fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 1) of
  556:                                       eof -> eof;
  557:                                       {ok, Chars} ->
  558:                                           case io:get_line(standard_io, "") of
  559:                                               eof -> Chars;
  560:                                               Line ->
  561:                                                   {ok, [Chars, Line]}
  562:                                           end
  563:                                   end
  564:                          end, [binary]),
  565: 
  566:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "1\n"),
  567:     {ok, "got: [<<\"1\">>,<<\"\\n\">>]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  568:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  569:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  570: 
  571:     ok.
  572: 
  573: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  574: file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  575:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  576:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  577:                          [binary],
  578:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  579: 
  580:     %% Invalid utf8
  581:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  582: 
  583:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  584:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  585:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  586:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  587:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  588: 
  589:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  590:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  591:                          [binary],
  592:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  593: 
  594:     %% Valid utf8
  595:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  596: 
  597:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  598:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  599:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  600:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  601:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  602: 
  603:     %% Setting using io:setopts used to hang on Windows, see #7459 for details.
  604:     {ok, P3, ErlPort3} = start_stdin_node(
  605:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  606:                          [binary],
  607:                          "-eval \"io:setopts([{encoding, latin1}])\""),
  608: 
  609:     %% Invalid utf8
  610:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort3, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  611: 
  612:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  613:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  614:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  615:     ErlPort3 ! {self(), close},
  616:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  617: 
  618:     ok.
  619: 
  620: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  621: file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode(_Config) ->
  622:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  623:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  624:                          [list],
  625:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  626: 
  627:     %% Invalid utf8
  628:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  629: 
  630:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  631:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  632:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  633:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  634:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  635: 
  636:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  637:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  638:                          [list],
  639:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  640: 
  641:     %% Valid utf8
  642:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  643: 
  644:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  645:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  646:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),

  649:

  651: 
  652: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is not utf8,
  653: %% but unicode is printed out
  654: io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode(_Config) ->
  655:     {ok, P, ErlPort} =
  656:         start_stdin_node(
  657:           fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 5) of
  658:                        {ok, Chars} ->
  659:                            %% We've read a unicode string as latin1,
  660:                            %% which means that if we convert it to
  661:                            %% a binary it will be seen as the original
  662:                            %% unicode string.
  663:                            io:format("~ts",[list_to_binary(Chars)]),
  664:                            {ok, Chars};
  665:                        Else ->
  666:                            Else
  667:                    end
  668:           end,
  669:           [list],
  670:           "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  671: 
  672:     %% Valid utf8
  673:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"duπa"/utf8>>),
  674: 
  675:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  676:     receive
  677:         {ErlPort, {data, Data}} ->
  678:             %% On stdout any unicode should be translated to hex syntax
  679:             "du\\x{3C0}a" = Data
  680:     end,
  681: 
  682:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  683:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  684: 
  685:     ok.
  686: 
  687: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions) ->
  688:     start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, "").
  689: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, ExtraArgs) ->
  690:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{active, false},{packet,4}]),
  691:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  692:     Cmd = lists:append(
  693:             [ct:get_progname(),
  694:              " -noshell ",
  695:              ExtraArgs,
  696:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  697:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " read_raw_from_stdin ", integer_to_list(Port)]),
  698:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
  699:     ErlPort = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof, stderr_to_stdout,
  700:                                        {env, [{"LC_CTYPE","en_US.UTF-8"}]}]),
  701:     {ok, P} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  702:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(IoOptions)),
  703:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(ReadFun)),
  704:     {ok, P, ErlPort}.
  705: 
  706: read_raw_from_stdin([Port]) ->
  707:     try
  708:         {ok, P} = gen_tcp:connect(localhost, list_to_integer(atom_to_list(Port)),
  709:                                   [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
  710:         {ok, OptionsBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  711:         io:setopts(standard_io, binary_to_term(OptionsBin)),
  712:         {ok, ReadFunBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  713:         spawn(fun() ->
  714:                       gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  715:                       init:stop("crash")
  716:               end),
  717:         read_raw_from_stdin(binary_to_term(ReadFunBin), P)
  718:     catch E:R:ST ->
  719:             io:format(standard_error, "~p  ~p",[Port,{E,R,ST}])
  720:     end.
  721: read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P) ->
  722:     case ReadFun() of
  723:         eof ->
  724:             gen_tcp:send(P, "got: eof"),
  725:             init:stop();
  726:         {ok, Char} ->
  727:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  728:                               io_lib:format("got: ~p\n",[Char]))),
  729:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  730:         {ok, Fmt, Char} ->
  731:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  732:                               io_lib:format("got: "++Fmt++"\n",[Char]))),
  733:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  734:         {error, Reason} ->
  735:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  736:                               io_lib:format("error: ~p\n",[Reason]))),
  737:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P)
  738:     end.
  739: 
  740: get_lc_ctype() ->
  741:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  742: 	{{unix,sunos},{5,N,_}} when N =< 8 ->
  743: 	    "iso_8859_1";
  744: 	_ ->
  745: 	    "ISO-8859-1"
  746:     end.
  747: 
  748: %% Test various unicode options.
  749: unicode_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  750:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  751:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  752:     %% A string in both russian and greek characters, which is present
  753:     %% in all the internal test files (but in different formats of course)...
  754:     TestData = [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  755: 		1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  756: 		1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  757: 		32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  758: 		963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963],
  759:     %% Testdata from Chinese open source customer, that triggered OTP-7974
  760:     TestData2 = [46,46,46,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,
  761: 		 12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,
  762: 		 12411,12370,44,44,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,12411,12370,12411,
  763: 		 12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,
  764: 		 12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,44,10],
  765: 
  766:     %% The external test files are generated with a BOM writing
  767:     %% text editor. A shorter line is written (with two characters 
  768:     %% larger than 127).
  769:     ExternalTestData = [197,116,101,114,101,114,246,118,114,97],
  770:     InternalBomFiles = ["testdata_utf8_bom.dat",
  771: 			"testdata_utf16_big_bom.dat",
  772: 			"testdata_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  773: 			"testdata_utf32_big_bom.dat",
  774: 			"testdata_utf32_little_bom.dat"],
  775:     AllNoBom = [{utf8,"testdata_utf8.dat"},
  776: 		{utf16,"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  777: 		{{utf16,big},"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  778: 		{{utf16,little},"testdata_utf16_little.dat"},
  779: 		{utf32,"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  780: 		{{utf32,big},"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  781: 		{{utf32,little},"testdata_utf32_little.dat"}],
  782:     ExternalBomFiles = ["external_utf8_bom.dat",
  783: 			"external_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  784: 			"external_utf16_big_bom.dat"],
  785:     ReadBomFile = fun(File,Dir) ->
  786: 			  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  787: 					     [read,binary]),
  788: 			  {ok,Bin} = file:read(F,4),
  789: 			  {Type,Bytes} = unicode:bom_to_encoding(Bin),
  790: 			  file:position(F,Bytes),
  791: 			  io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Type}]),
  792: 			  R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  793: 				io:get_chars(F,'',length(TestData)),unicode),
  794: 			  file:close(F),
  795: 			  R
  796: 		  end,
  797:     ReadBomlessFile = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  798: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  799: 						 [read,binary,
  800: 						  {encoding,Type}]),
  801: 			      R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  802: 				    io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),unicode),
  803: 			      file:close(F),
  804: 			      R
  805: 		      end,
  806:     ReadBomlessFileList = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  807: 				  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  808: 						     [read,
  809: 						      {encoding,Type}]),
  810: 				  R = io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),
  811: 				  file:close(F),
  812: 				  R
  813: 			  end,
  814:     ReadBomlessFileListLine = fun({Type,File},Dir) ->
  815: 				      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  816: 							 [read,
  817: 							  {encoding,Type}]),
  818: 				      R = io:get_line(F,''),
  819: 				      file:close(F),
  820: 				      R
  821: 			      end,
  822:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- InternalBomFiles ],
  823:     [ExternalTestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- ExternalBomFiles ],
  824:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  825:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  826:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  827: 
  828:     BomDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMDATA"]),
  829:     BomlessDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMLESSDATA"]),
  830:     file:make_dir(BomDir),
  831:     file:make_dir(BomlessDir),
  832: 
  833:     WriteBomFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  834: 			   {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  835: 					      [write,binary]),
  836: 			   file:write(F,unicode:encoding_to_bom(Enc)),
  837: 			   io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Enc}]),
  838: 			   io:put_chars(F,TestData),
  839: 			   file:close(F),
  840: 			   ok
  841: 		   end,
  842:     [ ok = WriteBomFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  843:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,BomDir) || {_,F} <- AllNoBom ],
  844:     WriteBomlessFile = fun({Enc,File},TData,Dir) ->
  845: 			       {ok,F} = file:open(
  846: 					  filename:join([Dir,File]),
  847: 					  [write,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  848: 			       io:put_chars(F,TData),
  849: 			       file:close(F),
  850: 			       ok
  851: 		       end,
  852:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  853:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  854:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  855:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  856: 
  857:     CannotReadFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  858: 			     %%io:format(standard_error,"~s\r\n",[filename:join([Dir,File])]),
  859: 			     {ok,F} = file:open(
  860: 					filename:join([Dir,File]),
  861: 					[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  862: 			     Enc2 = case Enc of
  863: 					utf8 ->
  864: 					    unicode;
  865: 					Tpl when is_tuple(Tpl) ->
  866: 					    Tpl;
  867: 					Atom when is_atom(Atom) ->
  868: 					    {Atom, big}
  869: 				    end,
  870: 			     {error, {no_translation,Enc2,latin1}} = 
  871: 				 file:read(F,10),
  872: 			     {error,terminated} = io:get_chars(F,'',10),
  873: 			     ok
  874: 		     end,
  875:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  876:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  877:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  878: 
  879:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData2,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  880:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  881:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  882:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  883: 
  884: 
  885:     FailDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"FAIL"]),
  886:     file:make_dir(FailDir),
  887: 
  888:     CannotWriteFile = fun({_Enc,File},Dir) ->
  889: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(
  890: 					 filename:join([Dir,File]),
  891: 					 [write,binary]),
  892: 			      {'EXIT', {no_translation,_}} =
  893: 				  (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  894: 			      {'EXIT', {terminated,_}} = (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  895: 			      ok
  896: 		      end,
  897:     [ ok = CannotWriteFile(F,FailDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  898: 
  899:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  900: 	new ->
  901: 	    %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  902: 	    rtnode:run(
  903:               [{putline,""},
  904:                {putline, "2."},
  905:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  906:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  907:                {expect, "{encoding,latin1}"},
  908:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  909:                {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  910:                {putline, "io:setopts([unicode])."},
  911:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  912:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  913:                {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  914:               ],[],"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]);
  915:         _ ->
  916:             ok
  917:     end,
  918:     rtnode:run(
  919:       [{putline,""},
  920:        {putline, "2."},
  921:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  922:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  923:        {expect, "[\n ]{encoding,latin1}"},
  924:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  925:        {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  926:        {putline, "io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."},
  927:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  928:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  929:        {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  930:       ],[],"",
  931:       ["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
  932:     ok.
  933: 
  934: %% Tests various unicode options on random generated files.
  935: unicode_options_gen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  936:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a alot of time
  937:     rand:seed(default),
  938:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  939:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  940:     AllModes = [utf8,utf16,{utf16,big},{utf16,little},
  941: 		utf32,{utf32,big},{utf32,little}],
  942:     FSize = 9*1024,
  943:     NumItersRead = 2,
  944:     NumItersWrite = 2,
  945:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "GENDATA1"),
  946:     file:make_dir(Dir),
  947: 
  948:     DoOneFile1 =
  949: 	fun(Encoding, N, M) ->
  950: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  951: 		ct:log("Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  952: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  953: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  954: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  955: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  956: 		Bin = unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist, utf8, Encoding),
  957: 		ok = file:write_file(Fname, Bin),
  958: 
  959: 		Read1 = fun(FD) -> io:get_line(FD, '') end,
  960: 		Res1 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  961: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  962: 				       Read1),
  963: 
  964: 		Read2 = fun(FD) -> io:get_chars(FD, '', M) end,
  965: 		Res2 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  966: 				       [read,binary,
  967: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  968: 				       Read2),
  969: 
  970: 		Read3 = fun(FD) ->
  971: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  972: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  973: 				    Other -> Other end
  974: 			end,
  975: 		Res3 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  976: 				       [read,binary,
  977: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  978: 				       Read3),
  979: 
  980: 		Read4 = fun(FD) ->
  981: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  982: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  983: 				    Other -> Other end
  984: 			end,
  985: 		Res4 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  986: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  987: 				       Read4),
  988: 
  989: 		Ulist2 = [X || X <- Ulist, X =/= $\n, X =/= $\s, X =/= $\t],
  990: 		Ulist = done(Res1),
  991: 		Ulist = done(Res2),
  992: 		Ulist2 = done(Res3),
  993: 		Ulist2 = done(Res4),
  994: 
  995: 		file:delete(Fname)
  996: 	end,
  997:     [ [ [ DoOneFile1(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  998: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  999: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersRead) ],
 1000: 
 1001:     DoOneFile2 =
 1002: 	fun(Encoding,N,M) ->
 1003: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
 1004: 		ct:log("Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
 1005: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
 1006: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
 1007: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
 1008: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
 1009: 
 1010: 		Res1 = write_read_file(Fname, 1,
 1011: 				       [write],
 1012: 				       Encoding,
 1013: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
 1014: 
 1015: 		Res2 = write_read_file(Fname, 2,
 1016: 				       [write,binary],
 1017: 				       Encoding,
 1018: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
 1019: 
 1020: 		Fun3 = fun(FD) ->
 1021: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~tc", [C]) || C <- Ulist],
 1022: 			       ok
 1023: 		       end,
 1024: 		Res3 = write_read_file(Fname, 3,
 1025: 				       [write],
 1026: 				       Encoding,
 1027: 				       Fun3),
 1028: 
 1029: 		Fun4 = fun(FD) ->
 1030: 			       io:put_chars(FD,
 1031: 					    unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist))
 1032: 		       end,
 1033: 		Res4 = write_read_file(Fname, 4,
 1034: 				       [write],
 1035: 				       Encoding,
 1036: 				       Fun4),
 1037: 
 1038: 		LL = string:tokens(Ulist, "\n"),
 1039: 		Fun5 = fun(FD) ->
 1040: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~ts", [L]) || L <- LL],
 1041: 			       ok
 1042: 		       end,
 1043: 		Res5 = write_read_file(Fname, 5,
 1044: 				       [write],
 1045: 				       Encoding,
 1046: 				       Fun5),
 1047: 
 1048: 		Ulist2 = lists:flatten(LL),
 1049: 		ResBin = done(Res1),
 1050: 		ResBin = done(Res2),
 1051: 		ResBin = done(Res3),
 1052: 		ResBin = done(Res4),
 1053: 		Ulist = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin, Encoding),
 1054: 
 1055: 		ResBin2 = done(Res5),
 1056: 		Ulist2 = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin2, Encoding),
 1057: 
 1058: 		ok
 1059: 	end,
 1060:     [ [ [ DoOneFile2(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
 1061: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
 1062: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersWrite) ],
 1063:     ok.
 1064: 
 1065: read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
 1066:     do(fun() ->
 1067: 	       do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun)
 1068:        end).
 1069: 
 1070: do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
 1071:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, Options),
 1072:     Res = do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F),
 1073:     ok = file:close(F),
 1074:     unicode:characters_to_list(Res, unicode).
 1075: 
 1076: do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F) ->
 1077:     case Fun(F) of
 1078: 	eof ->
 1079: 	    [];
 1080: 	{error,Error} ->
 1081: 	    receive after 10000 -> ok end,
 1082: 	    exit(Error);
 1083: 	Other ->
 1084: 	    [Other|do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F)]
 1085:     end.
 1086: 
 1087: write_read_file(Fname0, N, Options, Enc, Writer) ->
 1088:     Fname = Fname0 ++ "_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
 1089:     do(fun() ->
 1090: 	       do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Enc, Writer)
 1091:        end).
 1092: 
 1093: do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Encoding, Writer) ->
 1094:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, [{encoding,Encoding}|Options]),
 1095:     Writer(F),
 1096:     ok = file:close(F),
 1097:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Fname),
 1098:     ok = file:delete(Fname),
 1099:     Bin.
 1100: 
 1101: enc2str(Atom) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1102:     atom_to_list(Atom);
 1103: enc2str({A1,A2}) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
 1104:     atom_to_list(A1)++"_"++atom_to_list(A2).
 1105: 
 1106: 
 1107: random_unicode(0) ->
 1108:     %% io:fread(Device, Promp, "~ts") will return an error if the file
 1109:     %% ends with whitespace characters. This behavior seems to be
 1110:     %% deliberate. Therefore, be sure that we never end the file with
 1111:     %% a sequence of whitespace characters.
 1112:     [$! + rand:uniform(64) |
 1113:      case rand:uniform(20) of
 1114:          A when A =< 1 -> [$\n];
 1115:          _ -> []
 1116:      end];
 1117: random_unicode(N) ->
 1118:     %% Favor large unicode code points and make line breaks.
 1119:     X = case rand:uniform(20) of
 1120: 	    A when A =< 1 -> $\n;
 1121: 	    A when A =< 3 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF);
 1122: 	    A when A =< 6 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7F) + 16#7F;
 1123: 	    A when A =< 12 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7FF) + 16#7FF;
 1124: 	    _ -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#FFFF) + 16#FFFF
 1125: 	end,
 1126:     if
 1127:         X =:= $\r;                            %Can be eaten by io:get_line/2.
 1128:         16#D800 =< X, X =< 16#DFFF;
 1129:         X =:= 16#FFFE;
 1130:         X =:= 16#FFFF ->
 1131: 	    random_unicode(N);
 1132: 	true ->
 1133: 	    [X | random_unicode(N-1)]
 1134:     end.
 1135: 
 1136: 
 1137: %% Test variants with binary option.
 1138: binary_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1139:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1140:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1141:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1142: 		 [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
 1143: 		  1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
 1144: 		  1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
 1145: 		  32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
 1146: 		  963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963]),
 1147:     <<First10:10/binary,Second10:10/binary,_/binary>> = TestData,
 1148:     First10List = binary_to_list(First10),
 1149:     Second10List = binary_to_list(Second10),
 1150:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir, "testdata_utf8.dat"]),
 1151:     {ok, F} = file:open(TestFile,[read]),
 1152:     {ok, First10List} = file:read(F,10),
 1153:     io:setopts(F,[binary]),
 1154:     {ok, Second10} = file:read(F,10),
 1155:     file:close(F),
 1156:     {ok, F2} = file:open(TestFile,[read,binary]),
 1157:     {ok, First10} = file:read(F2,10),
 1158:     io:setopts(F2,[list]),
 1159:     {ok, Second10List} = file:read(F2,10),
 1160:     file:position(F2,0),
 1161:     First10List = io:get_chars(F2,'',10),
 1162:     io:setopts(F2,[binary]),
 1163:     Second10 = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_chars(F2,'',10),unicode,latin1),
 1164:     file:close(F2),
 1165:     LineBreakFileName =  filename:join([PrivDir, "testdata.dat"]),
 1166:     LineBreakTestData = <<TestData/binary,$\n>>,
 1167:     LineBreakTestDataList = binary_to_list(LineBreakTestData),
 1168:     file:write_file(LineBreakFileName,[LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,TestData]),
 1169:     {ok, F3} = file:open(LineBreakFileName,[read]),
 1170:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1171:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1172:     LineBreakTestData =  unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1173:     io:setopts(F3,[list]),
 1174:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1175:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1176:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1177:     eof = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1178:     file:close(F3),
 1179: 
 1180:     %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
 1181:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1182: 	new ->
 1183: 	    rtnode:run(
 1184:               [{putline, "2."},
 1185:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1186:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1187:                {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1188:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1189:                {putline, "hej"},
 1190:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1191:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1192:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1193:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1194:                {putline, "hej"},
 1195:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1196:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1197:                {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1198:                {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1199:               ],[]);
 1200:         _ ->
 1201:             ok
 1202:     end,
 1203:     %% And one with oldshell
 1204:     rtnode:run(
 1205:       [{putline, "2."},
 1206:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1207:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1208:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1209:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1210:        {putline, "hej"},
 1211:        {expect, "[\n ]\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1212:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1213:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1214:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1215:        {putline, "hej"},
 1216:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1217:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1218:        {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1219:        {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1220:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
 1221:     ok.
 1222: 
 1223: answering_machine1(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->
 1224:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1225:     TestDataUtf = binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1)),
 1226:     TestDataLine1Oct = "\\\\345( \b)*\\\\344( \b)*\\\\366",
 1227:     rtnode:run(
 1228:       [{putline,""},
 1229:        {putline, "2."},
 1230:        {expect, "2"},
 1231:        {putline, "io:getopts()."},
 1232:        {expect, ">"},
 1233:        {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},
 1234:        {expect, "<"},
 1235:        %% get_line
 1236:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1237:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1238:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1239:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1240:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1241:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1242:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1243:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1244:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1245:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1246:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1247:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1248:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1249:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1250:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1251:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1252:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1253:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1254:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1255:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1256:        %% get_chars
 1257:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1258:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1259:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1260:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1261:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1262:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1263:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1264:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1265:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1266:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1267:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1268:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1269:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1270:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1271:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1272:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1273:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1274:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1275:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1276:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1277:        %% fread
 1278:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1279:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1280:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1281:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1282:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1283:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1284:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1285:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1286:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1287:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1288:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1289:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1290:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1291:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1292:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1293:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1294:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1295:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1296:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1297:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1298: 
 1299:       ],Me,"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
 1300:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
 1301:     O ! {self(),done},
 1302:     ok.
 1303: 
 1304: answering_machine2(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->

 1308:       [{putline,""},

 1310:        {expect, "2"},
 1311:        {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},

 1313:        %% get_line
 1314:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1315:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1316:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1317:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1318:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1319:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1320:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1321:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1322:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1},
 1323:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1324:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1325:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1326:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1},
 1327:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1328:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1329:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1330:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1331:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1332:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1333:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1334:        %% get_chars
 1335:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1336:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1337:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1338:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1339:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1340:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1341:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1342:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1343:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1},
 1344:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1345:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1346:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1347:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1},
 1348:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1349:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1350:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1351:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1352:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1353:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1354:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1355:        %% fread
 1356:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1357:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1358:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1359:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1360:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1361:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1362:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1363:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1364:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1},
 1365:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1366:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1367:        {putline, TestDataLine1},

 1369:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1370:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1371:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1372:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1373:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1374:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1375:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1376: 
 1377:       ],Me,"",["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
 1378:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
 1379:     O ! {self(),done},
 1380:     ok.
 1381: 
 1382: 
 1383: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1384: read_modes_ogl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1385:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1386: 	noshell ->
 1387: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1388: 	_ ->
 1389: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine2)
 1390:     end.
 1391: 
 1392: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1393: read_modes_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1394:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1395: 	noshell ->
 1396: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1397: 	old ->
 1398: 	    {skipped,"No new shell"};
 1399: 	_ ->
 1400: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine1)
 1401:     end.
 1402: 
 1403: read_modes_gl_1(_Config,Machine) ->
 1404:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1405:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1406:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = list_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1407: 
 1408:     N2List = peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1409:     MyNodeList = atom2list(node()),
 1410:     register(io_proto_suite,self()),
 1411:     AM1 = spawn(?MODULE,Machine,
 1412: 		[MyNodeList, "io_proto_suite", N2List]),
 1413: 
 1414:     GL = receive X when is_pid(X) -> X end,
 1415:     ?dbg({group_leader,X}),
 1416:     %% get_line
 1417:     receive after 500 -> ok end, % Dont clash with the new shell...
 1418:     "Hej\n" = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1419:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1420:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1421:     <<"Hej\n">> = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1422:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1423:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1424:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1425:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1426:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1427:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1428: 
 1429:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1430:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1431:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1432:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1433:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1434:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1435: 
 1436:     %%get_chars
 1437:     "Hej" = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1438:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1439:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1440:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1441:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1442:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1443:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1444:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1445:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1446:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1447: 
 1448:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1449:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1450:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1451:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1452:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1453:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1454:     %%fread
 1455:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1456:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1457:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1458:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1459:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1460:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1461:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1462:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1463:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1464:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1465:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1466:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1467:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1468:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1469:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1470:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1471: 
 1472: 
 1473:     receive
 1474: 	{AM1,done} ->
 1475: 	    ok
 1476:     after 5000 ->
 1477: 	    exit(timeout)
 1478:     end,
 1479:     ok.
 1480: 
 1481: logging_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1482: 
 1483:     AssertString = fun(Match) ->
 1484:                            fun F() ->
 1485:                                    ?MODULE ! {get, self()},
 1486:                                    receive
 1487:                                        {put_chars, _, M} ->
 1488:                                            case string:find(M, Match) of
 1489:                                                nomatch -> io:format("~p~n",[M]), F();
 1490:                                                _ -> ok
 1491:                                            end
 1492:                                    after 500 -> timeout end
 1493:                            end
 1494:                    end,
 1495:     
 1496:     AssertTimeout = fun() ->
 1497:                             ?MODULE ! {get, self()},
 1498:                             receive
 1499:                                 timeout -> ok;
 1500:                                 Msg -> {unexpected, Msg}
 1501:                              end
 1502:                     end,
 1503: 
 1504:     rtnode:run(
 1505:       [{putline,""},
 1506:        {putline, "2."},
 1507:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
 1508:        {eval, fun() ->
 1509:                       Device = spawn(
 1510:                                  fun F() ->
 1511:                                          receive
 1512:                                              {get, Parent} ->
 1513:                                                  receive {io_request, From, ReplyAs, M} ->
 1514:                                                          Parent ! M,
 1515:                                                          From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, ok}
 1516:                                                  after 500 ->
 1517:                                                          Parent ! timeout
 1518:                                                  end,
 1519:                                                  F()
 1520:                                          end
 1521:                                  end),
 1522:                       register(?MODULE, Device),
 1523:                       ok = logger:add_handler(default, logger_std_h, #{ filter_default => stop, config => #{ type => {device, Device} }}),
 1524:                       ok = io:setopts(user, [{log,output}])
 1525:               end},
 1526:        {putline, "io:format(user,\"abc\n\",[])."},
 1527:        {expect, "abc\r\nok"},
 1528:        {eval, AssertTimeout},
 1529:        {eval, fun() -> ok = logger:add_handler_filter(default, stderr, {fun logger_filters:domain/2, {log, sub, [otp, kernel, io]}}) end},
 1530:        {putline, "io:format(user,\"abc\n\",[])."},
 1531:        {expect, "abc\r\nok"},
 1532:        {eval, AssertString("abc\n")},
 1533: 
 1534:        %% Check that no input events are logged
 1535:        {putline, "io:setopts([{log, output}])."},
 1536:        {expect, "\r\nok"},
 1537:        {eval, AssertString("ok\n")},
 1538:        {eval, AssertTimeout},
 1539: 
 1540:        %% Check that input events work
 1541:        {putline, "io:setopts([{log, input}])."},
 1542:        {expect, "\r\nok"},
 1543:        {eval, AssertString("get_until")},
 1544:        {putline, "io:get_line(\"prompt: \")."},
 1545:        {expect, "prompt: "},
 1546:        {eval, AssertString("get_line")},
 1547:        {putline, "def"},
 1548:        {expect, "\\Q\"def\\n\"\\E"},
 1549: 
 1550:        {eval, fun() -> ok = logger:set_primary_config(level, info) end}
 1551:       ],[],"",
 1552:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1553:        "-oldshell",
 1554:        "-connect_all","false",
 1555:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1556:        "-kernel","logger","[{handler, default, undefined}]",
 1557:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1558:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false"]),
 1559:     ok.
 1560: 
 1561: %% Test behaviour when reading broken Unicode files
 1562: broken_unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1563:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1564:     Latin1Name = filename:join([Dir,"latin1_data_file.dat"]),
 1565:     Utf8Name = filename:join([Dir,"utf8_data_file.dat"]),
 1566:     Latin1Data = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255)++[255,255,255])),
 1567:     Utf8Data = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1568: 		 lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255))),
 1569:     file:write_file(Latin1Name,Latin1Data),
 1570:     file:write_file(Utf8Name,Utf8Data),
 1571:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1572:     [ utf8 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Utf8Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1573:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf16) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1574:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf32) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1575:     ok.
 1576: 
 1577: 
 1578: %%
 1579: %% From the cookbook, more or less
 1580: heuristic_encoding_file2(FileName,Chunk,Enc) ->
 1581:     {ok,F} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
 1582:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1583: 
 1584: loop_through_file2(_,eof,_,Enc) ->
 1585:     Enc;
 1586: loop_through_file2(_,{error,_Err},_,_) ->
 1587:     latin1;
 1588: loop_through_file2(F,Bin,Chunk,Enc) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1589:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1590: 
 1591: %% Test eof before newline on stdin when erlang is in pipe.
 1592: eof_on_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1593:     case {ct:get_progname(),os:type()} of
 1594: 	{Erl,{unix,linux}} ->
 1595: 	    %% Not even Linux is reliable - echo can be both styles
 1596: 	    try
 1597: 		EchoLine = case os:cmd("echo -ne \"test\\ntest\"") of
 1598: 			       "test\ntest" ->
 1599: 				   "echo -ne \"a\\nbu\" | ";
 1600: 			       _ ->
 1601: 				   case os:cmd("echo \"test\\ntest\\c\"") of
 1602: 				       "test\ntest" ->
 1603: 					   "echo \"a\\nbu\\c\" | ";
 1604: 				       _ ->
 1605: 					   throw(skip)
 1606: 				   end
 1607: 			   end,
 1608: 		CommandLine1 = EchoLine ++
 1609: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1610: 		    "'io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1611: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1612: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1613: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine1) of
 1614: 		    "\"a\\n\"\"bu\"eof" ->
 1615: 			ok;
 1616: 		    Other1 ->
 1617: 			exit({unexpected1,Other1})
 1618: 		end,
 1619: 		CommandLine2 = EchoLine ++
 1620: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1621: 		    "'io:setopts([binary]),io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1622: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1623: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1624: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine2) of
 1625: 		    "<<\"a\\n\">><<\"bu\">>eof" ->
 1626: 			ok;
 1627: 		    Other2 ->
 1628: 			exit({unexpected2,Other2})
 1629: 		end
 1630: 	    catch
 1631: 		throw:skip ->
 1632: 		    {skipped,"unsupported echo program"}
 1633: 	    end;
 1634: 	{_,_} ->
 1635: 	    {skipped,"Only on linux"}
 1636:     end.
 1637: 
 1638: raw_stdout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1639:     Cmd = lists:append(
 1640:             [ct:get_progname(),
 1641:              " -noshell -noinput",
 1642:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1643:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " write_raw_to_stdout"]),
 1644:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
 1645:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof]),
 1646:     Expected = lists:seq(0,255),
 1647:     Expected = get_all_port_data(Port, []),
 1648:     Port ! {self(), close},
 1649:     ok.
 1650: 
 1651: get_all_port_data(Port, Acc) ->
 1652:     receive
 1653:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 1654:             get_all_port_data(Port, [Acc|Data]);
 1655:         {Port, eof} ->
 1656:             lists:flatten(Acc)
 1657:     end.
 1658: 
 1659: write_raw_to_stdout() ->
 1660:     try
 1661:         ok = io:setopts(standard_io, [{encoding, latin1}]),
 1662:         ok = file:write(standard_io, lists:seq(0,255)),
 1663:         halt(0)
 1664:     catch
 1665:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 1666:             io:format(standard_error, "~p~p~p", [Class, Reason, StackTrace]),
 1667:             halt(17)
 1668:     end.
 1669: 
 1670: raw_stdout_isatty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1671:     rtnode:run(
 1672:         [{putline,"io:setopts(group_leader(), [{encoding, latin1}])."},
 1673:          {putline,"file:write(group_leader(),[90, 127, 128, 255, 131, 90, 10])."},%
 1674:          {expect, "\\QZ^?\\200\\377\\203Z\\E"}
 1675:         ],[]),
 1676:         ok.
 1677: %%
 1678: %% Test I/O-server
 1679: %%
 1680: 
 1681: start_io_server_proxy() ->
 1682:     spawn_link(?MODULE,io_server_proxy,[#state{}]).
 1683: 
 1684: proxy_getall(Pid) ->
 1685:     req(Pid,{self(),getall}).
 1686: proxy_setnext(Pid,Data) when is_list(Data) ->
 1687:     req(Pid,{self(),next,Data}).
 1688: proxy_quit(Pid) ->
 1689:     req(Pid,{self(),quit}).
 1690: 
 1691: req(Pid,Mess) ->
 1692:     Pid ! Mess,
 1693:     receive
 1694: 	{Pid, Answer} ->
 1695: 	    Answer
 1696:     after 5000 ->
 1697: 	    exit(timeout)
 1698:     end.
 1699: 
 1700: io_server_proxy(State) -> 
 1701:     receive
 1702:         {io_request, From, ReplyAs, Request} ->
 1703:             case request(Request,State) of
 1704:                 {Tag, Reply, NewState} when Tag =:= ok; Tag =:= error ->
 1705:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1706:                     io_server_proxy(NewState);
 1707:                 {stop, Reply, _NewState} ->
 1708:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1709:                     exit(Reply)
 1710:             end;
 1711:         %% Private message
 1712:         {From, next, Data} ->
 1713:             From ! {self(), ok},
 1714:             io_server_proxy(State#state{nxt = Data});
 1715:         {From, getall} ->
 1716:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1717:             io_server_proxy(State#state{q=[]});
 1718:         {From, quit} ->
 1719:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1720: 	    ok;
 1721:         _Unknown ->
 1722:             io_server_proxy(State)
 1723:     end.
 1724: 
 1725: reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply) ->
 1726:     From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, Reply}.
 1727: 
 1728: request({put_chars, Encoding, Chars}, State) ->
 1729:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Chars} | State#state.q ]}};
 1730: request({put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args}, State) ->
 1731:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args} | 
 1732: 			    State#state.q ]}};
 1733: request({get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As}, State) ->
 1734:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, q = [{get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As} | State#state.q]}};
 1735: request({get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N}, State) ->
 1736:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1737: 									   q = [{get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N} |
 1738: 										State#state.q]}};
 1739: request({get_line, Encoding, Prompt}, State) ->
 1740:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), 
 1741:      State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1742: 		 q = [{get_line, Encoding, Prompt} | 
 1743: 		      State#state.q]}};
 1744: request({get_geomentry,_}, State) ->
 1745:     {error, {error,enotsup}, State};
 1746: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, false}]; Opts =:= [list] ->
 1747:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = list}};
 1748: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, true}]; Opts =:= [binary] ->
 1749:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = binary}};
 1750: request(getopts, State) ->
 1751:     {ok, case State#state.mode of
 1752: 	     list -> [{binary,false}];
 1753: 	     binary -> [{binary, true}]
 1754: 	 end, State#state{q=[getopts | State#state.q ]}};
 1755: request({requests, Reqs}, State) ->
 1756:     multi_request(Reqs, {ok, ok, State}).
 1757: 
 1758: multi_request([R|Rs], {ok, _Res, State}) ->
 1759:     multi_request(Rs, request(R, State));
 1760: multi_request([_|_], Error) ->
 1761:     Error;
 1762: multi_request([], State) ->
 1763:     State.
 1764: 
 1765: convert(Atom,_,_) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1766:     Atom;
 1767: convert(Data, unicode, list) ->
 1768:     unicode:characters_to_list(Data,unicode);
 1769: convert(Data, latin1, list) ->
 1770:     try
 1771: 	L = unicode:characters_to_list(Data, unicode),
 1772: 	[ true = Ch =< 255 || Ch <- L ],
 1773: 	L
 1774:     catch
 1775: 	_:_ ->
 1776: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1777:     end;
 1778: convert(Data, unicode, binary) ->
 1779:     unicode:characters_to_binary(Data,unicode,unicode);
 1780: convert(Data, latin1, binary) ->
 1781:     case unicode:characters_to_binary(Data, unicode, latin1) of
 1782: 	Bin when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1783: 	    Bin;
 1784: 	_ ->
 1785: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1786:     end.
 1787: 
 1788: atom2list(A) ->
 1789:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w", [A])).
 1790: 
 1791: chomp([]) ->
 1792:     [];
 1793: chomp([$\n]) ->
 1794:     [];
 1795: chomp([H|T]) ->
 1796:     [H|chomp(T)];
 1797: chomp(<<>>) ->
 1798:     <<>>;
 1799: chomp(<<$\n>>) ->
 1800:     <<>>;
 1801: chomp(<<Ch,Rest/binary>>) ->
 1802:     X = chomp(Rest),
 1803:     <<Ch,X/binary>>;
 1804: chomp(Atom) ->
 1805:     Atom.
 1806: 
 1807: do(Fun) ->
 1808:     {_,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 1809: 				    exit(Fun())
 1810: 			    end),
 1811:     Ref.
 1812: 
 1813: done(Ref) ->
 1814:     receive
 1815: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Result} ->
 1816: 	    Result
 1817:     end.
